alert.note: Alert for Bibb; Dallas; Perry (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 23 at 8:25PM CDT until March 25 at 5:52AM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Alabama... Cahaba River At Centreville affecting Bibb, Perry and Dallas Counties. .Flooding continues on the Cahaba River and a flood warning remains in effect. Another statement will be issued by Thursday morning, or sooner if conditions warrant. && ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY FRIDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Cahaba River At Centreville. * WHEN...Until early Friday morning. * IMPACTS...At 23.0 feet, Pasture lands begin to flood in the Centreville area. At 30.0 feet, Considerable flooding of farm and pasture lands in the area occurs...and cattle may need to be moved to higher ground. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:15 PM CDT Wednesday the stage was 26.2 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 7:15 PM CDT Wednesday was 26.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to crest at 26.6 feet tonight. It will then fall below flood stage Thursday afternoon. - Flood stage is 23.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
